footer.info: 'IR Master Group' Limited Liability Company was founded in 2017. 'İR Master Group' LLC carries out repair, construction, installation and after-sales service of electricity, heating, cooling, ventilation and water supply systems.

about.title: About Us
about.us_info: 'IR Master Group' LLC was established in 2017. 'IR Master Group' LLC specializes in the installation and post-sales service of repair, construction, electrical, heating, cooling, ventilation, and water supply systems. Our company’s core principles are based on customer satisfaction. 'IR Master Group' LLC has ample experience in delivering services and providing service maintenance. Additionally, planning and designing works is one of the company’s main activities.
about.mission_info: As 'IR Master Group' LLC, we guarantee the highest level of solutions for projects of any scale and complexity. With professionalism, experience, and a strong engineering team, our company can minimize risks and ensure the quality execution of tasks. 'IR Master Group LLC' was established in 2017. Our main goal is to provide quality services with a professional approach, reliability, customer satisfaction, and a unique style in the construction sector. Operating with a team of professional engineers and workers, 'IR Master Group LLC' is also a reliable partner. Delivering projects with high-quality materials, according to standards, and on time is our main priority.
about.safety_info: 'IR Master Group LLC' was established in 2017. services.title: Our Services
services.description: IRM Master Group is a specialized company in the installation and design of repair, construction, electrical, heating, cooling, ventilation, and water supply systems in the Azerbaijani market. We perform installation and service work for heating, cooling, ventilation, as well as cooling systems for server rooms with high professionalism. Our main goal is to satisfy our customers and achieve the highest quality.

01.title: Repair and Construction Services
items: Implementation of works according to any taste and design in repair-construction works. Current and major repairs of new and existing projects.

02.title: Heating Systems
items: Installation of heating systems with all types of equipment powered by electricity and natural gas in production, warehouse, residential, and non-residential areas. Examples include chillers, rooftops, gas and electric air conditioners, boilers, hot water and electric floor systems, radiators, and equipment.

03.title: Cooling Systems
items: Cooling of production, warehouse, residential, and non-residential areas using chillers, rooftops, centralized and split air conditioners.

05.title: Ventilation
items: Installation of ventilation systems for medical centers, clinics, production, warehouses, residential, and non-residential areas.

06.title: Supply
items: Provision of construction and non-construction materials according to customer requests.
